Title: An Act Establishing a Community Hospital with a Ten-Bed Capacity and Secondary Level Capability, in the Island of Olongapo, City of Lapu-Lapu, to be Known as Sta. Rosa Community Hospital, and Authorizing the Appropriation of Funds Therefor
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 134
An Act Establishing a Community Hospital with a Ten-Bed Capacity and Secondary Level Capability, in the Island of Olongapo, City of Lapu-Lapu, to be Known as Sta. Rosa Community Hospital, and Authorizing the Appropriation of Funds Therefor
Section 1. There shall be established under the direct supervision of the Director of Medical Services, Ministry of Health, a community hospital with a ten-bed capacity and with secondary level capability in the Island of Olongapo, City of Lapu-Lapu, to be known as the Sta. Rosa Community Hospital.
Section 2. The amount needed for the operation of the hospital shall be determined in accordance with Section 40 of the Presidential Decree No. 1177 and charged to the appropriations authorized by Batas Pambansa Blg. 80 for the Ministry of Health, intended for new hospitals. Thereafter, such sum as may be necessary for its operation and maintenance shall be included in the annual General Appropriations Act. The Minister of Health shall determine the manner by which said hospital shall be operationalized.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.1Ã¢wphi1
Approved: September 12, 1981
